content: increases paired work applied i-cord bind off until 3 stitches remain with 13 left leaning decreases total have been on left hand needle using kitchener stitch worked join 3 live stitches from right hand needle to those from left hand needle transition no shaping row 1 rs mc k3 brk1 sl1yo brk1 to last 3 sts sl3 finishing wyif slide sts weave in ends block and enjoy your delightful new row 2 1 rs cc k3 sl1yo brp1 sl1yo to last 3 sts sl3 scarf as well as your new skills wear with pride take wyif turn a selfie and share your gorgeous new hat with me row 3 ws mc k3 brp1 sl1yo brp1 to last 3 sts sl3 using the #tanisfiberarts & #tfaswishscarf hashtags wyif slide sts row 4 ws cc k3 sl1yo brk1 sl1yo to last 3 sts sl3 wyif turn © tanis fiber arts 2022 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com
